text: 'as became clear american health care act would pass house representatives thursday many congressional democrats started chanting well known song na na hey hey kiss goodbye republicans secured vote enough secure passage legislation received democratic votes many chamber broke singing famous taunt apparent reference belief republicans suffer politically result vote vote house minority leader nancy pelosi calif said gop would pay price bill passage elections senate minority leader chuck schumer ny said bill going nowhere fast united states senate final gavel came announcing bill passage vote house democrats belted second time famous refrain nah nah nah nah hey hey hey goodbye years chant staple athletic events taunt opposing team wednesday jeer hearkened back similar political moment house democrats secured votes pass president clinton annual budget democratic rep marjorie margolies mezvinsky voted support measure despite home constituency skeptical measure met republican heckles goodbye marjorie subsequently lost election bid number republican lawmakers touted house passing ahca today made good promise repeal replace obamacare said congressman darrell issa r calif lets stop pretending obamacare going fix somehow someday going get better todays vote gives voice victims obamacare millions americans paying higher premiums receiving less coverage status quo offered end sight additional reporting benjamin siegel '
